name: 薛文景
objective: 本課程在討論生醫材料性質與應用臨床與研究領域。課程內容包括生醫材料之發展,牙醫材料之應用,材料在生醫工程之應用,生醫材料之機制以及生醫材料之製程。
schedule:
Bio materials
Chapter 1-3. March
Chapter 4-9, April
Mid-term test
Chapter 10-13. May
Chapter 14-16, June
Finaltest
scorePolicy: Based on the whole covered content of the texts and journals there will be two take home exam for both midterm and final tests.
